items.sentence: Tom said Mary needs to do that sometime today.
Tom fell in love with a girl he met in Boston.
I didn't know that Tom and John were brothers.
By the time I got there, Tom was already gone.
I knew something horrible was about to happen.
Tom said he won't do that unless you help him.
Why do you look older than your older brother?
It's about time for us to start taking action.
You didn't really think I meant that, did you?
It seems Tom doesn't really care what happens.
